mema siyaluma bodhin wahanse budupilima katharagama wadamawa gena yama wesak pura pasaloswaka dina aluyama 3.30 ta pannipitiyen aarambhawe.homagama awissawella rathnapuraya, palmadulla, thidolkatiya, udawalawa, thanamalwila, lunugamwehera, thissamaharamaya osse 17 wanida paswaruwe katharagamata mema maha budu perahara langa wimata niyamitha ya.gaman margaye yana siyalu denata me bodhin wahanselata budu pilimawalata wandana kirime awasthawa salasa dimata niyamitha ya.me budu pilima thanpath kirime saha bodhin wahanse ropanaya kirime pinkama 18 wanida sawasa 2.30 ta katharagama kiriwehera thewani maluwedi aarambha weyi.pilima wahanse thanpath kirima sandaha katharagama kiriwehera chaithya bhumiya idikara athi budukutiprathama pahan pujawa ha atawisi buddha pujawa me dina sawasa 6 ta ahalakanne sumana himiyan ge meheyawimen sidukere.

2018 shri lankawehi aandukrama wyawasthamaya arbudaya - wikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya 2018 shri lankika aandukrama wyawasthamaya arbudaya shri lankawehi siwil yuddhayehi anitu wipakaya saha shri lankika janadhipathiwaranaya, 2015 hi kotasaki 26 okthombar 2018 – 16 desambar 2018 (sathi 7 yi saha dina 2 yi ) 2015 jathika eksath rajaya wisuruwaharima hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha agramathyawaraya lesin path kirima thanathurudhari agramathya ranil wikramasinha thanathuren pahakirima parlimenthuwa thawakalikawa athhituwima saha wisuruwaharima udghoshana, adhiwasa, maha wadawarjana ranil wikramasinha mahatha agramathyawaraya lesin yali-path kirimath samagama nima wiya janadhipathi maithripala sirisena wisin agramathyawaraya lesin mahinda rajapaksha pathkirima agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha thanathuren paha kirima janadhipathi sirisena mahatha wisin parlimenthuwa athhituwima thanathuren pahakirima pilinogath ranil wikramasinha mahatha araliyagaha mandiraya thula randi sitima nawa kabinat mandalaya pathkirima kabinat thanathuru sandaha allas labadun/gath bawata chodana parlimenthuwa wisuruwahari janadhipathi sirisena wisin parlimenthu mathiwaranaya pawathwana lesata mathiwarana komisamata niyoga kirima parlimenthu wisuruwaharime janadhipathiwarayage aagnyawa shreshtadhikaranaya wisin thawakalikawa athhituwayi.
